channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege

item.title: CVE-2022-22385|2024-09-13T16:12:35.194Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could disclose sensitive information to an attacked due to the transmission of data in clear text. IBM X-Force ID: 221962.

item.title: CVE-2022-22384|2024-09-13T16:16:06.591Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow an attacker to modify messages returned from the server due to hazardous input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 221961.

item.title: CVE-2022-22386|2024-09-13T16:14:52.599Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 221963.

item.title: CVE-2022-22377|2024-09-13T16:17:43.723Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 221827.

item.title: CVE-2024-31887|2024-06-04T17:36:55.759Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege 11.6.25 could allow an unauthenticated actor to obtain sensitive information from the SOAP API. IBM X-Force ID: 287651.

item.title: CVE-2024-31887|2024-08-02T01:59:50.153Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege 11.6.25 could allow an unauthenticated actor to obtain sensitive information from the SOAP API. IBM X-Force ID: 287651.
